Class KeyPadDecoder

Provides functionality to decode input strings simulating old mobile phone keypads.

Decode(string)

Decodes the provided keypad input string and prints the result to the console.

Declaration
public void Decode(string input)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string input

A string of digits and control characters: Digits (0â€“9) represent key presses, space (' ') confirms character selection, asterisk ('*') performs a backspace, and hash ('#') ends the input.
Examples

Example input: "4433555 555666#" prints "HELLO"
